name: Frame Tags
description:
Frame tags makes it easy to add tags to the top of frames and components to help show the stage the designs are at. This makes it easy to communicate with collaborators where attention may be required.

You can currently choose from the following list of tags:

  • Draft
  • Approved
  • Complete
  • Work in progress
  • Content required
  • Research required
  • Approval required
  • Revised
  • On hold
  • Ready for review
  • Ready for dev


How to use:

  1. Select the frames and/or components you want to add tags to
  2. Run the Frame Tags plugin
  3. If using a preset tag, youâ€™re all done!
  4. If using the Frame Tags UI, select the tag and color
  5. Click 'Create tag'


Roadmap:

1. Ability to add your own tags

2. Change text color of tag based on background color

3. Ability to select custom colors
